name: Cat Pix
description: This one page website or mobile app provides the user with joy and peace by allowing them to scroll through random cat pictures.

stories.name: HTML and CSS (or app layout and structure)
stories.description: Build out the look and feel of the website using HTML and CSS. If completing this project as a mobile app then build out the app layout and structure using the language of your choice.
requirements: Images are square, ie. they have the same height and width
Image size or the number of images should change based on the user's screen width
Image aspect ratio is maintained and image is centered after any scaling/cropping
The user can scroll to view more images

stories.name: API call
stories.description: Find a free API that will allow you to fetch random cat images and implement.
requirements: Fetch anywhere between 12 and 100 cat images. Ensure the number doesn't result in an unacceptably long page load time (1-2 seconds max)
If the API you choose returns duplicate images filter out the duplicates

stories.name: Mobile (web only)
stories.description: If completing this project for web, the mobile version of the app should follow the design attached.
requirements: On mobile display fewer images per row in order to ensure they are still easily viewable
